name: NightMares (itch) (Claudiotheworm)
description:
This Game was made in 1 WEEK for the DREAMS GAME JAM!

Rules: Use WASD to move around. Use Left Mouse Button to shoot. Kill all NIGHTMARES/Monsters to complete round.  Avoid taking damage from enemy lasers.

TIPS: Circle your enemies (do as big circles as necessary) to dodge attacks. Start at easy mode (which is hard enough). Also, in the last level(level 8) KILL THE PORTAL! When you kill it, something special happens...
